# RAKU

## Linters

| Linter               | Configuration key    | Additional                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|----------------------|----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [raku](raku_raku.md) | [RAKU](raku_raku.md) | [![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/rakudo/rakudo)](https://github.com/rakudo/rakudo/commits) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/rakudo/rakudo?cacheSeconds=3600)](https://github.com/rakudo/rakudo) |

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.raku`
  - `.rakumod`
  - `.rakutest`
  - `.pm6`
  - `.pl6`
  - `.p6`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                  | Description                   | Default value |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| RAKU_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| RAKU_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
